mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET custid=#{custid}, itemid=#{itemid}, cnt=#{cnt} WHERE cartid=#{cartid}
mapper.select: select ca.cartid, ca.custid, ca.itemid, ca.cnt, it.itemname, it.price, it.img, ca.cnt*it.price as totalprice from cart ca INNER JOIN item it ON ca.itemid = it.itemid INNER JOIN cust cu ON ca.custid = cu.custid WHERE ca.custid= #{custid}
